title: Is Iraq Finally Close to Restarting Kurdistan’s Oil Exports?
summary: Iraq has given the preliminary green light to oil exports from the semi-autonomous region of Kurdistan to resume, Reuters reported on Friday, citing sources with knowledge of ongoing talks. title: India Continues to Buy Russian Crude as Tensions With the U.S. Ease
summary: India will continue to buy Russian crude in the coming months, with active purchases for cargoes loading in November and December, sources familiar with the plans of Indian refiners told Bloomberg.
